name: Hardware Software Helper
tagline: A desktop application for helpful information on hardware and software, made with livecode
body:
# Hardware-Software-Helper
A desktop application for helpful information on hardware and software, made with LiveCode. Done as part of a school assessment task. It tells you all about computer Hardware, Software, and tons of other cool related stuff. 

## Download the application
Here you can download the Hardware Software Helper application for use straight away. To download the latest version [Click Here](#)

## Using the application
If you need help using the Hardware software helper application, you can download our handy user manual here. It details what each of the buttons and things are on each screen, and how to use the application to find the information you need.

## Geeky stuff
You can download the developer's manual, development journal and source file on our GitHub webpage. Click view on GitHub to view the project page and other useful stuff.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
